group_1.textLeft: These are all of the Magical Girls I could gather from Ryuugasaki.

group_1.textRight: I asked everyone to participate, but some of 'em wouldn't come.
Sorry 'bout that.

group_1.textCenter: Ten of you is plenty. @I appreciate your efforts.

group_1.textRight: ...Are you sure I don't need to go with you...?

group_1.textLeft: I'm more worried about Ao.
She seems like she's on thin ice right now,
so I want you to keep an eye on her.
Plus, it would be better not to have the @Horse of Toramayachi show up at the meeting.

group_1.textRight: ...Got it.
Just please be careful.

group_1.textLeft: (Now is the time to show them how serious we @are... It is no longer about winning or losing.)

group_1.textRight: Any news on the Witches?

group_1.textLeft: We're still investigating the reason for their disappearance.

group_1.textRight: I heard one of your members leading the @investigation has gone missing...

group_1.textLeft: ...Indeed.

group_1.textRight: You have no idea what's gonna happen next, @do you?

group_1.textLeft: No, we don't...

group_1.textRight: Let me get this straight...
We've been trying to thin the number of Magical @Girls so we can keep living on.
And you're here to convince us that we don't have to @do that anymore, because Witches are coming back. @Is that right?

group_1.textLeft: I believe that if we all work together, at least for the time being, it would likely hasten the investigation.

group_1.textRight: You know how bad things have been between us. @And now you wanna start over with a blank slate?
I think you're asking too much of us.

group_1.textLeft: ...I don't believe that the point of this meeting @was to question me like this, was it?
I've said my piece.
You've all agreed to work with me, so we're here to @set some ground rules.
If you start picking a fight like this, doesn't that @render our meeting pointless?

group_1.textRight: Sorry.
But I want you to consider how these girls are feelin' right now.
Our gangs have been at each other's throats so long, @we can't just start cooperating on a dime.
That's why we're bein' cautious about it.

group_1.textLeft: ...Fair enough. I understand.
Alright, putting that aside for now, let's talk about @those ground rules.
That's what you're all here for, yes?

group_1.textRight: We need you to make somethin' clear to us.

group_1.textLeft: What might that be?

group_1.textRight: We've been fightin' for so long that it's hard to tell @whose territory's where anymore.
So before we can join up with you, I wanna clarify @what turf belongs to who.

group_1.textLeft: What exactly...are you getting at...?
It sounds as though you're saying
that you're only agreeing to a ceasefire if we stay @out of your territory...
Or am I overthinking it...?

group_1.textRight: I mulled it over after you invited me.
I understand what you're trying to do, but I'm still @not convinced.
Maybe we can stop fighting with each other from @here on...
But no matter how hard I try, I just can't see myself working with Torayamachi.
Not only that, when I look back on everything that happened around here, all of the victims of our @fights...
The time when we decided to start huntin' Kyubey...
And the time when all of Futatsugi learned that @Magical Girls become Witches...
You were always there, Yuna Kureha.

group_1.textCenter: What are you girls truly here for...?
